item.title: GAMETHING
item.description: HOW ARE YOU EVEN SEEING THIS? GAMETHING GAMETHING is an audio book club about videogames. Experimental game designer Pippin Barr and writer-interviewer David Wolinsky exchange answerphone messages about anything and everything (mostly everything) they find interesting about videogames. (Subscribe to our newsletter to hear when new seasons are ready.) The episodes are short. You might as well listen to one. Season 1 (2018) GAMETHING · GAMETHING, season 1 Season 2 (2019) GAMETHING · GAMETHING, season 2 Links GAMETHING on SoundCloud
